In some cases, phone manufacturers have added a dark mode toggle into the system settings.
The Desk Mode can be activated by placing the phone in a desk dock.
Some phone manufacturers have deactivated or changed the behavior of the Android dark mode on their devices. Because of this, the Dark Mode app can\'t activate the dark mode on your phone.
To get the dark mode on older Android phones (up to Android 5.1 - Lollipop), you sometimes have to activate one of the following modes.
The FAQ answers the most commonly asked questions.
Is there another option to activate the dark mode?
You don\'t have to wait for Android 10 to get the dark mode!
Why do I have to activate the Car Mode?
Settings -> System -> Developer options -> Night mode
Dark Mode is enabled. What next?
Now that the dark mode is enabled, you will have several benefits:
